hiveArticle.title: Sunset in Bangalore, India
hiveArticle.body:
Yesterday was one of those days where you have to literally stop and click photos on your way back home. I was on a motorbike so it was easier for me to stop on the road and click some amazing photos of the Sky. 

![IMG_20180416_180845_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSehEGF9Lpdk3FUSDaFiK5J8rH2hhgMGBSCzfZYE8tp1r/IMG_20180416_180845_2.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180416_181120_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVWWwHLresFeoWDhTit32c7bytcKRbciwyFPtDTPCnfPi/IMG_20180416_181120_2.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180416_181114_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYsUTsEGChEcHSVsr48G66zwKKC625seFJkdfoehQQQ7j/IMG_20180416_181114_2.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180416_180854_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcgWnDTqBL8DAB9Zfhgear38Nre6MMnfwZv4BvgfhzQDb/IMG_20180416_180854_2.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180416_181124_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmNNgsYeiPANhkqSUtswtyHw3xXFAWQ9BGXrmAaNcbraBf/IMG_20180416_181124_2.jpg)

<hr>

### Camera : Nokia 6
